content.rendered:
Directed by Vasanth

Written by Vasanth

Star Lizzie Antony (Sports Coach HOD). Karthick Krishna C.S. (Hari). Lakshmi Priyaa Chandramouli (Sivaranjani). Vaali Mohan Das (Cameo). Karunakaran (Chandran). Sunder Ramu (Devaki Husband). Kalieaswari Srinivasan (Saraswathy). Parvathy Thiruvothu (Devaki). Sairam Vishwa (Cameo)

Language Tamil

Producers Vasanth

Production Hamsa Productions
